title: Name of types s.XX
content:
Hi

I am looking for the names of types that it was used in magazines or in newspaper of 1940-1980 in America.

Thanks

 [‹ Linotype Block Gothic?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706173649/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45322 "Go to previous forum topic") [Evisu Denim Script ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706173649/http:/www.typophile.com/node/45321 "Go to next forum topic")
author: PLYA

comments.content: This question is far too broad and ill-defined. Give us a list of publications with scans of the typefaces you’re looking for and we’ll be able to help you.

Thank you  
For instance the magazine: EROS, or Sanday post,..

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706173649im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/fact_magazine_6486.gif)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706173649im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/eros_17_6002.jpg)
